title: [Proposal] Oct 7 - 21 TrueFi LP Incentives
body:
Original Authors: Tyler Wallace, Ryan Rodenbaugh

**Proposal**

Decrease total LP emissions by 5% from 270,000 TRU/day to 256,500 TRU/day.

1. Decrease total tfTUSD emissions by 2,500 TRU/day to 27,500 TRU/day. 
   * In line with the ongoing tfTUSD pool migration, incentive emissions will be shifted to 80/20 between tfTUSD in the liquidity gauge and legacy tfTUSD.
   * 22,500 TRU/day to tfTUSD in liquidity gauge
   * 5,000 TRU/day to legacy tfTUSD farm
2. Decrease tfUSDC by 10,000 TRU/day to 140,000 TRU/day
3. Decrease tfUSDC by 1,000 TRU/day to 89,000 TRU/day

These changes will go into effect around noon PT on Thursday, October 7, 2021 if approved.

**Forum post:** https://forum.truefi.io/t/proposal-oct-7-21-truefi-lp-incentives/809
author: 0xFAeF58FE96e2eB81c1180f92730142C3015B8469
